answers.answer: Your blood pressure is known to get higher in docotor offices, the anixety bright lights. I bought a $30 blood pressure machine just to check it myself. Also Just ask your doctor for a EKG test (preeclampsia test) I did, he wasn't concerned about it but I asked him anyways because my mom had it with all four pregnancies but come to find out it's not hereditary
Thanks that's probably the test he running on me next week but if not I'll be way sure to ask

Yeah it's a weird test, they put all these sticky things on you (ankles, chest, arms) and run wires to them and this little machine tracks it. Literally takes a minute! But yeah just ask him a bunch of questions next visit so you feel at ease when leaving :) good luck!
Thanks so much and I surely will!
I really hope your blood pressure isn't that high and you misunderstood them. If it is you should be in the hospital. That is double the normal. You need to find out immediately
Sorry I meant 153 he said it's supposed to be 120 r slightly higher

question: Okay I had an appointment today and I told them I've been having swelled feet they said it's normal I told them okay I just wanted to make sure it wasn't pre-e because I heard that could be a symptom OK my last check up at 30 weeks they took my blood pressure 3 ×s ended up going with the lesser which was like 230 something this time around at 33 week it was 253 then they had me lay on my left side and ended up with 248 so I have to do a 24 hour urine start that Tuesday morning take it in Wednesday he set me up to come next week to run tests I've been having migraines but I've been had them before getting pregnant he told me if they getting any worse go to hospital they checked his heart beat n said it was good OK what would happen next could they make a good delivery for my baby what would they have me to do I'm feeling on edge I just want my baby healthy and here when it's time thanks for help I know this is long
title: Preeclampsia??? Anyone?
